    • Field Detail

      • disableAudio

        public static boolean disableAudio
        If true, OpenAL will not be used. This means Application.getAudio() returns null and the gdx-openal.jar and OpenAL natives are not needed.

      • useGL30

        public boolean useGL30
        whether to attempt use OpenGL ES 3.0.

      • r

        public int r
        number of bits per color channel

      • g

        public int g
        number of bits per color channel

      • b

        public int b
        number of bits per color channel

      • a

        public int a
        number of bits per color channel

      • depth

        public int depth
        number of bits for depth and stencil buffer

      • stencil

        public int stencil
        number of bits for depth and stencil buffer

      • samples

        public int samples
        number of samples for MSAA

      • width

        public int width
        width & height of application window

      • height

        public int height
        width & height of application window

      • x

        public int x
        x & y of application window, -1 for center

      • y

        public int y
        x & y of application window, -1 for center

      • fullscreen

        public boolean fullscreen
        fullscreen

      • vSyncEnabled

        public boolean vSyncEnabled
        whether to enable vsync, can be changed at runtime via Graphics.setVSync(boolean)

      • title

        public java.lang.String title
        title of application

      • forceExit

        public boolean forceExit
        whether to call System.exit() on tear-down. Needed for Webstarts on some versions of Mac OS X it seems

      • resizable

        public boolean resizable
        whether the window is resizable

      • audioDeviceSimultaneousSources

        public int audioDeviceSimultaneousSources
        the maximum number of sources that can be played simultaneously

      • audioDeviceBufferSize

        public int audioDeviceBufferSize
        the audio device buffer size in samples

      • audioDeviceBufferCount

        public int audioDeviceBufferCount
        the audio device buffer count

      • initialBackgroundColor

        public Color initialBackgroundColor

      • foregroundFPS

        public int foregroundFPS
        Target framerate when the window is in the foreground. The CPU sleeps as needed. Use 0 to never sleep.

      • backgroundFPS

        public int backgroundFPS
        Target framerate when the window is not in the foreground. The CPU sleeps as needed. Use 0 to never sleep, -1 to not render.

      • allowSoftwareMode

        public boolean allowSoftwareMode
        Allows software OpenGL rendering if hardware acceleration was not available.
        See Also:
        LwjglGraphics#isSoftwareMode()

      • preferencesDirectory

        public java.lang.String preferencesDirectory
        Preferences directory on the desktop. Default is ".prefs/".

    • Constructor Detail

      • LwjglApplicationConfiguration

        public LwjglApplicationConfiguration()

    • Method Detail

      • addIcon

        public void addIcon(java.lang.String path,
           Files.FileType fileType)
        Adds a window icon. Icons are tried in the order added, the first one that works is used. Typically three icons should be provided: 128x128 (for Mac), 32x32 (for Windows and Linux), and 16x16 (for Windows).

      • setFromDisplayMode

        public void setFromDisplayMode(Graphics.DisplayMode mode)
        Sets the r, g, b and a bits per channel based on the given Graphics.DisplayMode and sets the fullscreen flag to true.
        Parameters:
        mode -

      • getDesktopDisplayMode

        public static Graphics.DisplayMode getDesktopDisplayMode()

      • getDisplayModes

        public static Graphics.DisplayMode[] getDisplayModes()
